scripts.dev: parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run devserver > /dev/null' 2>&1 >/dev/null | node scripts/errorwatcher.js
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run js-watch' 'npm run scss-watch' 'npm run assets-watch'
scripts.build: npm run js && npm run scss && npm run assets && npm run jpgoptimize && npm run pngoptimize && npm run zip
scripts.js: mkdir -p build/js && babel --presets es2015 src/js/*.js src/js/**/*.js -o build/js/fiso.bundle.js && minify --template {{filename}}.{{ext}} build/js/
scripts.js-watch: mkdir -p build/js && babel --watch --source-maps --presets es2015 src/js/*.js src/js/**/*.js -o build/js/fiso.bundle.js
scripts.scss: node-sass src/scss/ -o build/css && postcss --use autoprefixer -r ./build/css/*.css && minify --template {{filename}}.{{ext}} build/css/
scripts.scss-watch: npm run scss && node-sass -w --source-map true src/scss/ -o build/css
scripts.assets-watch: npm run assets && onchange 'src/assets/**/*' -v -- npm run assets
